001011 00000 00001 0100000001001000     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 1111010111000011     # ori $r1 $r1   # 3.14f
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1

001011 00000 00001 0100000000110001     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 1110101110000101     # ori $r1 $r1   # 2.78f
110100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f2

111000 00001 00010 00011 00000 000000   # add.s $f1 $f2 $f3
000001 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f3
01000000101111010111000010100100        # 5.92f

111000 00010 00001 00011 00000 000000   # add.s $f2 $f1 $f3
000001 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f3
01000000101111010111000010100100        # 5.92f

001011 00000 00001 0100000001001000     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 1111010111000011     # ori $r1 $r1   # 3.14f
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1

001011 00000 00001 1100000001001000     # lui $r1
010111 00001 00001 1111010111000011     # ori $r1 $r1   # -3.14f
110100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f2

111000 00001 00010 00011 00000 000000   # add.s $f1 $f2 $f3
000001 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f3
00000000000000000000000000000000        # 0.0f

111000 00010 00001 00011 00000 000000   # add.s $f2 $f1 $f3
000001 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f3
00000000000000000000000000000000        # 0.0f

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
